name: Reason for Late Shipment
description: Reason code assigned by Planning/Shipping department per sales order item if the item is late. See 'Late Flag' field for the definition of late and SAP tcode ZSDSHIP_LATE to assign reason codes per late item.

annotations.name: TabularEditor_InPerspective
